text: Sergei Bagapsh (March 4, 1949 â€“ May 29, 2011), was the President of Abkhazia, from 12 February 2005, until 29 May 2011.The British Broadcasting Corporation He was also Prime Minister of Abkhazia during the late 1990s. He was born in Sukhumi, Soviet Union. He graduated from the Georgian State University of Subtropical Agriculture in Sukhumi. Bagapsh died of heart failure caused by lung cancer surgery, aged 62. == References == Category:1949 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Deaths from heart failure Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Presidents of Abkhazia Category:Prime ministers of Abkhazia
title: Sergei Bagapsh
